Kitchen sink for the pivotal W. This team has grit! Superstar of the East MVP of the League dominates the front court, allowing his teammates to fight for every possession and show the bucks who’s Boss. This was accomplished by another amazing showing by Big/Little Hart taking over the middle from the bucks own twin towers. OG return was a menace to the bucks offensive game plan in the 2nd half. He neutralized the biggest threats Portis Middleton. The Big Ragu held bucks back with sharp shooting. BB kept the game close in the first half when it looked bleak for the Knicks. This was the biggest win of the year. An L here would have put into question our playoff chances beyond an appearance of success. We can now focus on a strong finish and build on Mitchs comeback in the final stretch. If this game is the true Knicks character, no team is safe near or far. 🏀 💪
